name: CropPol

creator.affiliation: Estación Biológica de Doñana (EBD-CSIC), Avda. Américo Vespucio 26, Isla de la Cartuja, 41092 Sevilla, Spain
creator.name: Ignasi Bartomeus

creator.affiliation: Estación Biológica de Doñana (EBD-CSIC), Avda. Américo Vespucio 26, Isla de la Cartuja, 41092 Sevilla, Spain
creator.name: Alfonso Allen-Perkins

description: CropPol is a dynamic and open global database on crop pollination. It contains measurements recorded within 158 crop studies, covering 2,786 field observations, 2,115 yield measurements, and 25,183 insect records from 41 commercial crops, distributed throughout the globe. Most studies (149) and crops (34) are among the leading pollinator dependent global crops and commodities. Indeed, the impact of pollinators on increasing production is essential in 23 systems, great in 75, little in 8, modest in 43, and unknown in 10. Malus domestica is the most represented crop (25 systems), followed by Brassica napus (16 systems), Vaccinium corymbosum (13 systems), and Citrullus lanatus (12 systems). The most abundant pollinator guilds recorded are honey bees (32.37% counts/visits), bumblebees (18.79%), flies other than Syrphydae and Bombyliidae (15.84%), beetles (13.20%), other wild bees (9.68%), and syrphids (5.24%). Locations comprise 30 countries distributed among the Americas (66 systems), Europe (60), Asia (16), Oceania (10), and Africa (7). The sampling spans over three decades and concentrates on 2001-05 (15 systems), 2006-10 (29), 2011-15 (72), 2016-20 (40).

spatialCoverage.name: The sampled locations span over 30 countries distributed among North and South America (66 studies), Europe (60), Asia (16), Oceania (10), and Africa (7).

variableMeasured.name: study_id
variableMeasured.description: identification code for a given study: Author name+crop name+country+year

variableMeasured.name: site_id
variableMeasured.description: identification code for a site within a study

variableMeasured.name: crop
variableMeasured.description: crop latin name

variableMeasured.name: variety
variableMeasured.description: crop variety name

variableMeasured.name: management
variableMeasured.description: management system implemented in the field: (1) Organic Agriculture, (2) Integrated pest management, and (3) Other Conventional Practices

variableMeasured.name: country
variableMeasured.description: country where the crop field is located

variableMeasured.name: latitude
variableMeasured.description: latitude (WGS84) of a given field expressed in degrees

variableMeasured.name: longitude
variableMeasured.description: longitude (WGS84) of a given field expressed in degrees

variableMeasured.name: X_UTM
variableMeasured.description: Easting planar coordinate of a given field expressed in meters

variableMeasured.name: Y_UTM
variableMeasured.description: Northing planar coordinate of a given field expressed in meters

variableMeasured.name: zone_UTM
variableMeasured.description: the UTM zone number of a given field.

variableMeasured.name: sampling_start_month
variableMeasured.description: month of the year at the beginning of the sampling period (for example, 1 for January, 2 for February and so on)

variableMeasured.name: sampling_end_month
variableMeasured.description: month of the year at the end of the sampling period (see description for sampling_start_month)

variableMeasured.name: sampling_year
variableMeasured.description: year in which the sampling was carried out

variableMeasured.name: field_size
variableMeasured.description: area of the field [hectare]

variableMeasured.name: yield
variableMeasured.description: yield value of a given field

variableMeasured.name: yield_units
variableMeasured.description: yield units

variableMeasured.name: yield2
variableMeasured.description: secondary yield value

variableMeasured.name: yield2_units
variableMeasured.description: secondary yield units

variableMeasured.name: yield_treatments_no_pollinators
variableMeasured.description: if the results for yield involve exclosures (e.g., bags, etc.), we fill this column with such results (measured as the first unit )

variableMeasured.name: yield_treatments_pollen_supplement
variableMeasured.description: if the results for yield were obtained by using an additional treatment (e.g., hand-pollination, etc.), we fill this column with such results measured as the first unit)

variableMeasured.name: yield_treatments_no_pollinators2
variableMeasured.description: if the results for secondary yield involve exclosures (e.g., bags, etc.), we fill this column with such results (second yield unit)

variableMeasured.name: yield_treatments_pollen_supplement2
variableMeasured.description: if the results for yield were obtained by using an additional treatment (e.g., hand-pollination, etc.), we fill this column with such results. (second yield unit)

variableMeasured.name: fruits_per_plant
variableMeasured.description: average number of fruits per plant [count per plant]

variableMeasured.name: fruit_weight
variableMeasured.description: average fruit weight [grams per fruit]

variableMeasured.name: plant_density
variableMeasured.description: amount of crop plants per unit area of crop field [individuals per square meter]

variableMeasured.name: seeds_per_fruit
variableMeasured.description: average number of seeds per fruit [count per fruit]

variableMeasured.name: seeds_per_plant
variableMeasured.description: average number of seeds per plant or pod [count per plant]

variableMeasured.name: seed_weight
variableMeasured.description: average seed weight [grams per 100 seeds]

variableMeasured.name: observed_pollinator_richness
variableMeasured.description: number of different pollinator species observed [counts]

variableMeasured.name: other_pollinator_richness
variableMeasured.description: estimated number of different species [counts]

variableMeasured.name: other_richness_estimator_method
variableMeasured.description: method used for estimating other_pollinator_richness, preferably Chao1.

variableMeasured.name: richness_restriction
variableMeasured.description: free text to describe constraints on richness/abundance measurements, such as only bees, only non-managed bees, etc.

variableMeasured.name: abundance
variableMeasured.description: total amount of counts along transect lines [counts]. In the case of performing several transect walks,we indicate the sum of the individuals collected.

variableMeasured.name: ab_honeybee
variableMeasured.description: total amount of transect counts for honey bees [counts]

variableMeasured.name: ab_bombus
variableMeasured.description: total amount of transect counts for bumble bees [counts]

variableMeasured.name: ab_wildbees
variableMeasured.description: total amount of transect counts for other wild bees [counts]

variableMeasured.name: ab_syrphids
variableMeasured.description: total amount of transect counts for syrphids [counts]

variableMeasured.name: ab_humbleflies
variableMeasured.description: total amount of transect counts for bombyliidae [counts]

variableMeasured.name: ab_other_flies
variableMeasured.description: total amount of transect counts for non syrphid or bombilida diptera [counts]

variableMeasured.name: ab_beetles
variableMeasured.description: total amount of transect counts for coleoptera [counts]

variableMeasured.name: ab_lepidoptera
variableMeasured.description: total amount of transect counts for lepidoptera (butterflies and moths) [counts]

variableMeasured.name: ab_nonbee_hymenoptera
variableMeasured.description: total amount of transect counts for nonbee hymenoptera (sawflies, wasps, ants, etc.) [counts]

variableMeasured.name: ab_others
variableMeasured.description: total amount of transect counts that were not included in the previous categories [counts]

variableMeasured.name: total_sampled_area
variableMeasured.description: area sampled during each census at each of the sites (e.g. area covered by one transect) in [square meters]. In the cases in which there was more than one sampling area within a site, this variable reflects the sum of their respective areas.

variableMeasured.name: total_sampled_time
variableMeasured.description: time spent sampling [minutes] each field. In the case in which sites were surveyed multiple times, this variable reflects the sum of their respective durations.

variableMeasured.name: visitation_rate_units
variableMeasured.description: number of legitimate visits (i.e. contacting reproductive structures) to crop units (flowers, branches,etc.), per unit time. Preferred units: [visits per 100 flowers during one hour].

variableMeasured.name: visitation_rate
variableMeasured.description: total visitation rate to crop units (flowers, branches,etc.) [in the visitation_rate_units].

variableMeasured.name: visit_honeybee
variableMeasured.description: guild (honey bees) visitation rate to crop units (flowers, branches,etc.) [in the visitation_rate_units].

variableMeasured.name: visit_bombus
variableMeasured.description: guild (bumble bees) visitation rate to crop units (flowers, branches,etc.) [in the visitation_rate_units].

variableMeasured.name: visit_wildbees
variableMeasured.description: guild (other wild bees) visitation rate to crop units (flowers, branches,etc.) [in the visitation_rate_units].

variableMeasured.name: visit_syrphids
variableMeasured.description: guild (syrphids) visitation rate to crop units (flowers, branches,etc.) [in the visitation_rate_units].

variableMeasured.name: visit_humbleflies
variableMeasured.description: guild (bombyliidae) visitation rate to crop units (flowers, branches,etc.) [in the visitation_rate_units].

variableMeasured.name: visit_other_flies
variableMeasured.description: guild (non syrphid or bombilida diptera) visitation rate to crop units (flowers, branches,etc.) [in the visitation_rate_units].

variableMeasured.name: visit_beetles
variableMeasured.description: guild (coleoptera) visitation rate to crop units (flowers, branches,etc.) [in the visitation_rate_units].

variableMeasured.name: visit_lepidoptera
variableMeasured.description: guild (lepidoptera: butterflies and moths) visitation rate to crop units (flowers, branches,etc.) [in the visitation_rate_units].

variableMeasured.name: visit_nonbee_hymenoptera
variableMeasured.description: guild (nonbee hymenoptera: sawflies, wasps, ants, etc.) visitation rate to crop units (flowers, branches,etc.) [in the visitation_rate_units].

variableMeasured.name: visit_others
variableMeasured.description: guild (other) visitation rate to crop units (flowers, branches,etc.) [in the visitation_rate_units].

variableMeasured.name: Publication
variableMeasured.description: If published, DOI of the publication (preferred) or article reference, if DOI is not available.

variableMeasured.name: Credit
variableMeasured.description: list with all authors who need to be given credit

variableMeasured.name: Email_contact
variableMeasured.description: email for contacting purposes.

variableMeasured.name: notes
variableMeasured.description: comments or clarifications on the values of a given variable

variableMeasured.name: sampling_method
variableMeasured.description: name of the organism recorded

variableMeasured.name: pollinator
variableMeasured.description: guild of the pollinator

variableMeasured.name: identified_to
variableMeasured.description: taxonomic resolution of the pollinator (whether identification is at the level of species, morphospecies, genera, etc).

variableMeasured.name: guild
variableMeasured.description: method to survey organisms. If multiple methods were used per organism, one independent row is added for each method.

variableMeasured.name: abundance
variableMeasured.description: number of individuals observed/collected. In the case of performing several censuses (transect walks/plant observations), this field reflects the sum of the individuals collected. When specified in description (variable), the values may refer to visitation rates.

variableMeasured.name: total_sampled_flowers
variableMeasured.description: number of flowers surveyed at each census (e.g., transect) per site.In the cases in which several censuses were performed, this variable reflects the sum of the respective counts.

variableMeasured.name: description
variableMeasured.description: free text to describe the overall methodology, including the number of temporal replicates per site and what a spatial replicate means in the corresponding study.

variableMeasured.name: notes
variableMeasured.description: free text to add comments on the taxa resolution or any other variables
